original_title: Sysco LABS completes 9th phase of its ‘Share a Meal; Share a Moment’ community program
original_body_lines: Sysco LABS Sri Lanka recently completed Phase 9 of their flagship sustainability initiative, ‘Share a Meal. Share a Moment’, distributing nearly 200 essential rations packs to underprivileged families in Lunawa, Moratuwa. The initiative aims to support communities and contribute to Sysco’s purpose of ‘Connecting the world to share food and care for one another’. In total, Sysco LABS has donated over 24,000 meals and 3,700 rations packs impacting more than 40,000 lives as a result of this initiative.
